profile.name: Prateek Mohan
profile.summary: Experienced Software Engineer with a comprehensive background in Cloud Computing and familiarity with Machine Learning. Proven ability to develop innovative solutions by utilizing software engineering standards, cloud technologies, and big data.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology, Computer Science and Engineering

achievements: Pioneered the automation of vSphere deployments, achieving a 90% reduction in deployment timeframes
Engineered and refined Kubernetes setups on VMware vSphere, leading to a 30% quicker deployment
Orchestrated the seamless integration of VMware vSphere Container Storage Plug-in with Kubernetes, delivering a 35% increase in storage efficiency and a 20% cost reduction
Created a Java-based validation tool for vSphere datacenter configurations, enhancing layout accuracy by 62%
Conducted a thorough analysis and refinement of data center lifecycle management processes, leading to a 15% savings in storage resource allocation
Employed Tanzu Observability by Wavefront for in-depth analytics on vSphere infrastructure, enhancing monitoring efficiency by 45% and accelerating performance troubleshooting by 50%
Architected a real-time Environmental Health Monitoring system by integrating disparate environmental data streams
Optimized data collection using cutting-edge API technology, reducing data inconsistencies by 27% and improving accuracy by 35%
Developed a novel cigarette intake equivalent metric by analyzing air pollution data and individual breathing rates

projects.name: Fetal Monitoring System
projects.description: Designed a low-cost fetal monitoring system using cloud solutions, achieving 98% cost reduction and 96% accuracy

projects.name: Indoor Positioning System
projects.description: Developed algorithms for Android phones that transformed sensor data into precise location data with 92% accuracy

projects.name: Depth Sensing Mono Camera
projects.description: Formulated a depth-sensing mono-camera program using Capsule neural networks for accurate depth estimation from monocular images

integrationAndEngineering: Implemented innovative solutions and engineered systems for optimal integration
